00047   Matrix::Matrix(const Vector3& translation)
00048   {
00049     m00 = 1; m01 = 0; m02 = 0; m03 = 0;
00050     m10 = 0; m11 = 1; m12 = 0; m13 = 0;
00051     m20 = 0; m21 = 0; m22 = 1; m23 = 0;
00052     m30 = translation.x; m31 = translation.y; m32 = translation.z; m33 = 1;
00053   }

00059     Real xy = rotation.x * rotation.y;
00060     Real xz = rotation.x * rotation.z;
00061     Real xw = rotation.x * rotation.w;
00062     Real yy = rotation.y * rotation.y;
00063     Real yz = rotation.y * rotation.z;

00069     m10 =   2*(xy+zw); m11 = 1-2*(xx+zz); m12 =   2*(yz-xw); m13 = 0;
00070     m20 =   2*(xz-yw); m21 =   2*(yz+xw); m22 = 1-2*(xx+yy); m23 = 0;
00071     m30 = m31 = m32 = 0; m33 = 1;
00072 #endif // 0
00074     *this = rotation.ToMatrix();
00075   }

00082   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::Identity
00083   const Matrix& Matrix::Identity()
00084   {
00085     m01 =  m02 =  m03 =
00086     m10 =  m12 =  m13 =
00087     m20 =  m21 =  m23 =
00088     m30 =  m31 =  m32 = 0.0f;
00089 
00090     m00 = m11 = m22 = m33 = 1.0f;
00091     return *this;
00092   }

00100                m03, m13, m23, m33 );
00101 
00102       memcpy(m_data,m.m_data,16*sizeof(Real));
00103     return *this;

00115   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::Determinant
00116   Real Matrix::Determinant() const
00117   {
00118 #if 1
00119     Real value =
00120       m03 * m12 * m21 * m30-m02 * m13 * m21 * m30-m03 * m11 * m22 * m30+m01 * m13    * m22 * m30+
00121       m02 * m11 * m23 * m30-m01 * m12 * m23 * m30-m03 * m12 * m20 * m31+m02 * m13    * m20 * m31+
00122       m03 * m10 * m22 * m31-m00 * m13 * m22 * m31-m02 * m10 * m23 * m31+m00 * m12    * m23 * m31+
00123       m03 * m11 * m20 * m32-m01 * m13 * m20 * m32-m03 * m10 * m21 * m32+m00 * m13    * m21 * m32+
00124       m01 * m10 * m23 * m32-m00 * m11 * m23 * m32-m02 * m11 * m20 * m33+m01 * m12    * m20 * m33+
00125       m02 * m10 * m21 * m33-m00 * m12 * m21 * m33-m01 * m10 * m22 * m33+m00 * m11    * m22 * m33;
00126     return value;
00127 
00128 #else
00129     Real det, result = 0, i = 1;
00130     Matrix3 msub3;
00131     int     n;
00132 
00133     for ( n = 0; n < 4; n++, i *= -1 )
00134     {
00135       msub3 = GetSubMatrix( 0, n );
00136 
00137       det     = msub3.Determinant();
00138       result += m_data[n] * det * i;
00139     }
00140 
00141     return result;
00142 #endif // 0
00143   }

00151   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::GetInverse
00152   Matrix Matrix::GetInverse() const
00153   {
00154 #if 1
00155     Real det = Determinant();
00156     Matrix mat;
00157     if ( FCOMPARE(det,0.0f) )
00158       return mat;
00159 
00160     mat.m00 = m12*m23*m31 - m13*m22*m31 + m13*m21*m32 - m11*m23*m32 - m12*m21*m33 + m11*m22*m33;
00161     mat.m01 = m03*m22*m31 - m02*m23*m31 - m03*m21*m32 + m01*m23*m32 + m02*m21*m33 - m01*m22*m33;
00162     mat.m02 = m02*m13*m31 - m03*m12*m31 + m03*m11*m32 - m01*m13*m32 - m02*m11*m33 + m01*m12*m33;
00163     mat.m03 = m03*m12*m21 - m02*m13*m21 - m03*m11*m22 + m01*m13*m22 + m02*m11*m23 - m01*m12*m23;
00164     mat.m10 = m13*m22*m30 - m12*m23*m30 - m13*m20*m32 + m10*m23*m32 + m12*m20*m33 - m10*m22*m33;
00165     mat.m11 = m02*m23*m30 - m03*m22*m30 + m03*m20*m32 - m00*m23*m32 - m02*m20*m33 + m00*m22*m33;
00166     mat.m12 = m03*m12*m30 - m02*m13*m30 - m03*m10*m32 + m00*m13*m32 + m02*m10*m33 - m00*m12*m33;
00167     mat.m13 = m02*m13*m20 - m03*m12*m20 + m03*m10*m22 - m00*m13*m22 - m02*m10*m23 + m00*m12*m23;
00168     mat.m20 = m11*m23*m30 - m13*m21*m30 + m13*m20*m31 - m10*m23*m31 - m11*m20*m33 + m10*m21*m33;
00169     mat.m21 = m03*m21*m30 - m01*m23*m30 - m03*m20*m31 + m00*m23*m31 + m01*m20*m33 - m00*m21*m33;
00170     mat.m22 = m01*m13*m30 - m03*m11*m30 + m03*m10*m31 - m00*m13*m31 - m01*m10*m33 + m00*m11*m33;
00171     mat.m23 = m03*m11*m20 - m01*m13*m20 - m03*m10*m21 + m00*m13*m21 + m01*m10*m23 - m00*m11*m23;
00172     mat.m30 = m12*m21*m30 - m11*m22*m30 - m12*m20*m31 + m10*m22*m31 + m11*m20*m32 - m10*m21*m32;
00173     mat.m31 = m01*m22*m30 - m02*m21*m30 + m02*m20*m31 - m00*m22*m31 - m01*m20*m32 + m00*m21*m32;
00174     mat.m32 = m02*m11*m30 - m01*m12*m30 - m02*m10*m31 + m00*m12*m31 + m01*m10*m32 - m00*m11*m32;
00175     mat.m33 = m01*m12*m20 - m02*m11*m20 + m02*m10*m21 - m00*m12*m21 - m01*m10*m22 + m00*m11*m22;
00176 
00177     mat = mat/det;
00178 
00179     return mat;
00180 
00181 #else
00182     Matrix3 mtemp;
00183     Matrix mat;
00184     int i, j, sign;
00185 
00186     if ( FCOMPARE(mdet,0.0f) )
00187       return mat;
00188 
00189     Real _1omdet = 1/mdet;
00190     for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
00191       for ( j = 0; j < 4; j++ )
00192       {
00193         sign = 1 - ( (i +j) % 2 ) * 2;
00194 
00195         mtemp = GetSubMatrix(i,j);
00196 
00197         mat.m_data[i+j*4] = ( mtemp.Determinant() * sign ) * _1omdet;
00198       }
00199       return mat;
00200 #endif
00201 
00202   }

00235   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::ToQuat
00236   Quaternion Matrix::ToQuat() const
00237   {
00238     // note: the addition of 1 was missed out in example, some I'm following that
00239     // may turn out dodgy
00240 
00241     Matrix m = this->GetTranspose();
00242 
00243     Real T = m.m_data[0] + m.m_data[5] + m.m_data[10] /*+ 1*/;
00244     if (T>0.0000001)
00245     { // do 'instant' calculation
00246       Real S = sqrt (T+1);
00247       Real w = 0.5f*S;
00248       S = 0.5f/S;
00249 
00250       return Quaternion (
00251         (m.m_data[9] - m.m_data[6])*S,
00252         (m.m_data[2] - m.m_data[8])*S,
00253         (m.m_data[4] - m.m_data[1])*S, w );
00254     }
00255 
00256     // identify which major diagonal element has the greatest value
00257     Real greatest = m.m_data[0];
00258     unsigned char c = 0;
00259     if (m.m_data[5] > greatest)
00260     {
00261       c = 1;
00262       greatest = m.m_data[5];
00263     }
00264     if (m.m_data[10] > greatest)
00265     {
00266       c = 1;
00267       greatest = m.m_data[10];
00268     }
00269 
00270     switch(c)
00271     {
00272     case 0:
00273       {
00274         Real S = sqrt( 1.0f + m.m_data[0] - m.m_data[5] - m.m_data[10]);
00275         Real _s = S * 0.5f;
00276         if (S != 0.0f)
00277           S = 0.5f/S;
00278 
00279         return Quaternion (
00280           _s,
00281           (m.m_data[4] + m.m_data[1]) * S,
00282           (m.m_data[2] + m.m_data[8]) * S,
00283           (m.m_data[9] - m.m_data[6]) * S);
00284       }
00285       break;
00286     case 1:
00287       {
00288         Real S = sqrt( 1.0f + m.m_data[5] - m.m_data[0] - m.m_data[10]);
00289         Real _s = S * 0.5f;
00290         if (S != 0.0f)
00291           S = 0.5f/S;
00292 
00293         return Quaternion (
00294           (m.m_data[4] + m.m_data[1]) * S,
00295           _s,
00296           (m.m_data[9] + m.m_data[6]) * S,
00297           (m.m_data[2] - m.m_data[8]) * S);
00298       }
00299       break;
00300     case 2:
00301       {
00302         Real S = sqrt( 1.0f + m.m_data[10] - m.m_data[0] - m.m_data[5]);
00303         Real _s = S * 0.5f;
00304         if (S != 0.0f)
00305           S = 0.5f/S;
00306 
00307         return Quaternion (
00308           (m.m_data[2] + m.m_data[8]) * S,
00309           (m.m_data[9] + m.m_data[6]) * S,
00310           _s,
00311           (m.m_data[4] - m.m_data[1]) * S);
00312       }
00313       break;
00314     default:
00315       assert(0);
00316       break;
00317     }
00318 
00319     return Quaternion();
00320   }

00322   //------------------------------------------------ operator *  Matrix
00323   Matrix Matrix::operator * (const Matrix& m) const
00324   {
00325     Matrix Nm;
00326 
00327     // -------------------------------- row 0
00328     Nm.m00  =  m00 * m.m00;
00329     Nm.m01  =  m01 * m.m00;
00330     Nm.m02  =  m02 * m.m00;
00331     Nm.m03  =  m03 * m.m00;
00332 
00333     Nm.m00 +=  m10 * m.m01;
00334     Nm.m01 +=  m11 * m.m01;
00335     Nm.m02 +=  m12 * m.m01;
00336     Nm.m03 +=  m13 * m.m01;
00337 
00338     Nm.m00 +=  m20 * m.m02;
00339     Nm.m01 +=  m21 * m.m02;
00340     Nm.m02 +=  m22 * m.m02;
00341     Nm.m03 +=  m23 * m.m02;
00342 
00343     Nm.m00 +=  m30 * m.m03;
00344     Nm.m01 +=  m31 * m.m03;
00345     Nm.m02 +=  m32 * m.m03;
00346     Nm.m03 +=  m33 * m.m03;
00347 
00348     // -------------------------------- row 1
00349     Nm.m10  =  m00 * m.m10;
00350     Nm.m11  =  m01 * m.m10;
00351     Nm.m12  =  m02 * m.m10;
00352     Nm.m13  =  m03 * m.m10;
00353 
00354     Nm.m10 +=  m10 * m.m11;
00355     Nm.m11 +=  m11 * m.m11;
00356     Nm.m12 +=  m12 * m.m11;
00357     Nm.m13 +=  m13 * m.m11;
00358 
00359     Nm.m10 +=  m20 * m.m12;
00360     Nm.m11 +=  m21 * m.m12;
00361     Nm.m12 +=  m22 * m.m12;
00362     Nm.m13 +=  m23 * m.m12;
00363 
00364     Nm.m10 +=  m30 * m.m13;
00365     Nm.m11 +=  m31 * m.m13;
00366     Nm.m12 +=  m32 * m.m13;
00367     Nm.m13 +=  m33 * m.m13;
00368 
00369     // -------------------------------- row 2
00370     Nm.m20  =  m00 * m.m20;
00371     Nm.m21  =  m01 * m.m20;
00372     Nm.m22  =  m02 * m.m20;
00373     Nm.m23  =  m03 * m.m20;
00374 
00375     Nm.m20 +=  m10 * m.m21;
00376     Nm.m21 +=  m11 * m.m21;
00377     Nm.m22 +=  m12 * m.m21;
00378     Nm.m23 +=  m13 * m.m21;
00379 
00380     Nm.m20 +=  m20 * m.m22;
00381     Nm.m21 +=  m21 * m.m22;
00382     Nm.m22 +=  m22 * m.m22;
00383     Nm.m23 +=  m23 * m.m22;
00384 
00385     Nm.m20 +=  m30 * m.m23;
00386     Nm.m21 +=  m31 * m.m23;
00387     Nm.m22 +=  m32 * m.m23;
00388     Nm.m23 +=  m33 * m.m23;
00389 
00390     // -------------------------------- row 3
00391     Nm.m30  =  m00 * m.m30;
00392     Nm.m31  =  m01 * m.m30;
00393     Nm.m32  =  m02 * m.m30;
00394     Nm.m33  =  m03 * m.m30;
00395 
00396     Nm.m30 +=  m10 * m.m31;
00397     Nm.m31 +=  m11 * m.m31;
00398     Nm.m32 +=  m12 * m.m31;
00399     Nm.m33 +=  m13 * m.m31;
00400 
00401     Nm.m30 +=  m20 * m.m32;
00402     Nm.m31 +=  m21 * m.m32;
00403     Nm.m32 +=  m22 * m.m32;
00404     Nm.m33 +=  m23 * m.m32;
00405 
00406     Nm.m30 +=  m30 * m.m33;
00407     Nm.m31 +=  m31 * m.m33;
00408     Nm.m32 +=  m32 * m.m33;
00409     Nm.m33 +=  m33 * m.m33;
00410 
00411     return Nm;
00412   }

00443     //Nv.x += m33 * v.w;
00444 
00445 #else
00446

00448     Nv.x += m01 * v.y;
00449     Nv.x += m02 * v.z;
00450     //Nv.x += m03 * v.w;
00451     Nv.x += m30;
00452

00454     Nv.y += m11 * v.y;

00457     Nv.x += m31;
00458 
00459     Nv.z  = m20 * v.x;
00460     Nv.z += m21 * v.y;

00462     //Nv.x += m23 * v.w;
00463     Nv.x += m32;
00464

00468     //Nv.x += m33 * v.w;
00469 #endif
00470 
00471

00475   //------------------------------------------------ operator *= Matrix
00476   const Matrix& Matrix::operator *= (const Matrix& m)
00477   {
00478     Matrix Nm (*this);
00479 
00480     // -------------------------------- row 0
00481     m00  =  Nm.m00 * m.m00;
00482     m01  =  Nm.m01 * m.m00;
00483     m02  =  Nm.m02 * m.m00;
00484     m03  =  Nm.m03 * m.m00;
00485 
00486     m00 +=  Nm.m10 * m.m01;
00487     m01 +=  Nm.m11 * m.m01;
00488     m02 +=  Nm.m12 * m.m01;
00489     m03 +=  Nm.m13 * m.m01;
00490 
00491     m00 +=  Nm.m20 * m.m02;
00492     m01 +=  Nm.m21 * m.m02;
00493     m02 +=  Nm.m22 * m.m02;
00494     m03 +=  Nm.m23 * m.m02;
00495 
00496     m00 +=  Nm.m30 * m.m03;
00497     m01 +=  Nm.m31 * m.m03;
00498     m02 +=  Nm.m32 * m.m03;
00499     m03 +=  Nm.m33 * m.m03;
00500 
00501     // -------------------------------- row 1
00502     m10  =  Nm.m00 * m.m10;
00503     m11  =  Nm.m01 * m.m10;
00504     m12  =  Nm.m02 * m.m10;
00505     m13  =  Nm.m03 * m.m10;
00506 
00507     m10 +=  Nm.m10 * m.m11;
00508     m11 +=  Nm.m11 * m.m11;
00509     m12 +=  Nm.m12 * m.m11;
00510     m13 +=  Nm.m13 * m.m11;
00511 
00512     m10 +=  Nm.m20 * m.m12;
00513     m11 +=  Nm.m21 * m.m12;
00514     m12 +=  Nm.m22 * m.m12;
00515     m13 +=  Nm.m23 * m.m12;
00516 
00517     m10 +=  Nm.m30 * m.m13;
00518     m11 +=  Nm.m31 * m.m13;
00519     m12 +=  Nm.m32 * m.m13;
00520     m13 +=  Nm.m33 * m.m13;
00521 
00522     // -------------------------------- row 2
00523     m20  =  Nm.m00 * m.m20;
00524     m21  =  Nm.m01 * m.m20;
00525     m22  =  Nm.m02 * m.m20;
00526     m23  =  Nm.m03 * m.m20;
00527 
00528     m20 +=  Nm.m10 * m.m21;
00529     m21 +=  Nm.m11 * m.m21;
00530     m22 +=  Nm.m12 * m.m21;
00531     m23 +=  Nm.m13 * m.m21;
00532 
00533     m20 +=  Nm.m20 * m.m22;
00534     m21 +=  Nm.m21 * m.m22;
00535     m22 +=  Nm.m22 * m.m22;
00536     m23 +=  Nm.m23 * m.m22;
00537 
00538     m20 +=  Nm.m30 * m.m23;
00539     m21 +=  Nm.m31 * m.m23;
00540     m22 +=  Nm.m32 * m.m23;
00541     m23 +=  Nm.m33 * m.m23;
00542 
00543     // -------------------------------- row 3
00544     m30  =  Nm.m00 * m.m30;
00545     m31  =  Nm.m01 * m.m30;
00546     m32  =  Nm.m02 * m.m30;
00547     m33  =  Nm.m03 * m.m30;
00548 
00549     m30 +=  Nm.m10 * m.m31;
00550     m31 +=  Nm.m11 * m.m31;
00551     m32 +=  Nm.m12 * m.m31;
00552     m33 +=  Nm.m13 * m.m31;
00553 
00554     m30 +=  Nm.m20 * m.m32;
00555     m31 +=  Nm.m21 * m.m32;
00556     m32 +=  Nm.m22 * m.m32;
00557     m33 +=  Nm.m23 * m.m32;
00558 
00559     m30 +=  Nm.m30 * m.m33;
00560     m31 +=  Nm.m31 * m.m33;
00561     m32 +=  Nm.m32 * m.m33;
00562     m33 +=  Nm.m33 * m.m33;
00563 
00564     return *this;
00565   }
00566 
00567   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::NewXAxisRotation
00568   chain::Matrix Matrix::NewXAxisRotation( const Real& a )
00569   {
00570     // transposed from 'norm' due to translation being on the bottom
00571     return Matrix ( 1,     0     ,     0     , 0,
00572                     0, CH_COS(a), CH_SIN(a), 0,
00573                     0,-CH_SIN(a), CH_COS(a), 0,
00574                     0,     0     ,     0     , 1);
00575   }
00576 
00577   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::NewYAxisRotation
00578   chain::Matrix Matrix::NewYAxisRotation( const Real& a )
00579   {
00580     // transposed from 'norm' due to translation being on the bottom
00581     return Matrix ( CH_COS(a), 0,-CH_SIN(a), 0,
00582                         0     , 1,     0     , 0,
00583                     CH_SIN(a), 0, CH_COS(a), 0,
00584                         0     , 0,     0     , 1);
00585   }
00586 
00587   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::NewZAxisRotation
00588   chain::Matrix Matrix::NewZAxisRotation( const Real& a )
00589   {
00590     // transposed from 'norm' due to translation being on the bottom
00591     return Matrix ( CH_COS(a), CH_SIN(a), 0, 0,
00592                    -CH_SIN(a), CH_COS(a), 0, 0,
00593                         0     ,     0     , 0, 0,
00594                         0     ,     0     , 0, 0);
00595   }
00596 
00597   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::NewQuaternionRotation
00598   chain::Matrix Matrix::NewQuaternionRotation( const Quaternion& q )
00599   {
00600     return q.ToMatrix();
00601   }
00602 
00603   //------------------------------------------------ Matrix::NewTranslation
00604   chain::Matrix Matrix::NewTranslation( const Vector3& t )
00605   {
00606     // transposed from 'norm' due to translation being on the bottom
00607     return Matrix ( 1 , 0 , 0 , 0,
00608                     0 , 1 , 0 , 0,
00609                     0 , 0 , 1 , 0,
00610                    t.x,t.y,t.z, 1);
00611   }

00645   //------------------------------------------------ operator *  Real
00646   Matrix Matrix::operator * (const Real& d) const
00647   {
00648     Matrix m (*this);
00649     Real* endit = m.m_data + 16;
00650     for(Real* p=m.m_data;p!=endit;++p)
00651     {
00652       (*p) *= d;
00653     }
00654     return m;
00655   }
00656 
00657   //------------------------------------------------ operator /  Real
00658   Matrix Matrix::operator / (const Real& d) const
00659   {
00660     Matrix m (*this);
00661     Real _1ov_d = 1/d;
00662     Real* endit = m.m_data + 16;
00663     for(Real* p=m.m_data;p!=endit;++p)
00664     {
00665       (*p) *= _1ov_d;
00666     }
00667     return m;
00668   }

00674     for(Real* p=m_data;p!=endit;++p)
00675     {
00676       (*p) *= d;
00677     }
00678     return *this;

00681   //------------------------------------------------ operator /= Real
00682   const Matrix& Matrix::operator /= (const Real& d)
00683   {
00684     Real _1ov_d = 1/d;
00685     Real* endit = m_data + 16;
00686     for(Real* p=m_data;p!=endit;++p)
00687     {
00688       (*p) *= _1ov_d;
00689     }
00690     return *this;
00691   }

00693   //------------------------------------------------ operator =  Matrix
00694    const Matrix& Matrix::operator = (const Matrix& m)
00695   {
00696     m00 = m.m00; m01 = m.m01; m02 = m.m02; m03 = m.m03;
00697     m10 = m.m10; m11 = m.m11; m12 = m.m12; m13 = m.m13;
00698     m20 = m.m20; m21 = m.m21; m22 = m.m22; m23 = m.m23;
00699     m30 = m.m30; m31 = m.m31; m32 = m.m32; m33 = m.m33;
00700     return *this;
00701   }
00702 
00703   const Matrix& Matrix::operator=( Quaternion& q )
00704   {
00705     return *this = q.ToMatrix();
00706   }

00708   //------------------------------------------------ operator == Matrix
00709    bool Matrix::operator == (const Matrix& m) const
00710   {
00711     return FCOMPARE( m00, m.m00 ) &&
00712            FCOMPARE( m01, m.m01 ) &&
00713            FCOMPARE( m02, m.m02 ) &&
00714            FCOMPARE( m03, m.m03 ) &&
00715 
00716            FCOMPARE( m10, m.m10 ) &&
00717            FCOMPARE( m11, m.m11 ) &&
00718            FCOMPARE( m12, m.m12 ) &&
00719            FCOMPARE( m13, m.m13 ) &&
00720 
00721            FCOMPARE( m20, m.m20 ) &&
00722            FCOMPARE( m21, m.m21 ) &&
00723            FCOMPARE( m22, m.m22 ) &&
00724            FCOMPARE( m23, m.m23 ) &&
00725 
00726            FCOMPARE( m30, m.m30 ) &&
00727            FCOMPARE( m31, m.m31 ) &&
00728            FCOMPARE( m32, m.m32 ) &&
00729            FCOMPARE( m33, m.m33 );
00730   }
00731 
00732   //------------------------------------------------ operator != Matrix
00733    bool Matrix::operator != (const Matrix& m) const
00734   {
00735     if( !FCOMPARE( m00, m.m00 ) ||
00736         !FCOMPARE( m01, m.m01 ) ||
00737         !FCOMPARE( m02, m.m02 ) ||
00738         !FCOMPARE( m03, m.m03 ) ||
00739 
00740         !FCOMPARE( m10, m.m10 ) ||
00741         !FCOMPARE( m11, m.m11 ) ||
00742         !FCOMPARE( m12, m.m12 ) ||
00743         !FCOMPARE( m13, m.m13 ) ||
00744 
00745         !FCOMPARE( m20, m.m20 ) ||
00746         !FCOMPARE( m21, m.m21 ) ||
00747         !FCOMPARE( m22, m.m22 ) ||
00748         !FCOMPARE( m23, m.m23 ) ||
00749 
00750         !FCOMPARE( m30, m.m30 ) ||
00751         !FCOMPARE( m31, m.m31 ) ||
00752         !FCOMPARE( m32, m.m32 ) ||
00753         !FCOMPARE( m33, m.m33 ) )
00754         return true;
00755     return false;
00756   }

00759   std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream &s, const Matrix& m)
00760   {
00761     s << m.m00 << " ";
00762      s << m.m01 << " ";
00763      s << m.m02 << " ";
00764      s << m.m03 << "\n";
00765 
00766      s << m.m10 << " ";
00767      s << m.m11 << " ";
00768      s << m.m12 << " ";
00769      s << m.m13 << "\n";

00771      s << m.m20 << " ";
00772      s << m.m21 << " ";
00773      s << m.m22 << " ";
00774      s << m.m23 << "\n";
00775 
00776      s << m.m30 << " ";
00777      s << m.m31 << " ";
00778      s << m.m32 << " ";
00779      s << m.m33 << "\n";
